title: Kansas City PD Requests Lull In Calls, Royals In Wild-Card Game
teaser: With the Royals and Oakland A's tied in the the 9th, the department tweeted: "We really need everyone to not commit crimes and drive safely." The Royals hadn't been in a postseason game since 1985.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
